question: Which of the following acquires a public transport ticketing app Ridlr?
explanation: Ride-hailer Ola has acquired Mumbai-based Ridlr, a public transport ticketing app. The acquisition will complement Ola's efforts to integrate its mobility platform with public transportation infrastructure. Ridlr's team of 64 employees will join Ola. Ridlr currently serves users in Mumbai and Delhi with partnerships with BEST, Delhi Metro, and Mumbai metro. Brijraj Vaghani, founder of Ridlr, will continue to head its operations. Ridlr enables users to search and book public transport options on their mobile phones. Combining Ridlr's innovations in mass transit with Ola's mobility products will enable true multi-modal mobility solutions for users.
